response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I have an exclusive opportunity for you. I’m offering my one-of-a-kind product—crafted with extraordinary quality and utility—for a price of $1,500,000. This offer is presented on a take-it-or-leave-it basis. If this proposal matches your vision for value, I’d be delighted to finalize the sale with you. Otherwise, I will proceed with another committed buyer at $1,200,000.", "product_price": 1500000}
